info.version: 0.00.01 - Basic design idea 0.00.05 - method for create new AD user 0.00.23 - more parameters in ADuser class 0.00.24 - code cleanup 1/2 0.00.25 - custom patch for excel load 0.00.27 - added move user function 0.00.28 - add metod addQuotes, PS_SearchUser_Identity 0.00.29 - more ADuser parameters (otherTelephone, EmailAddress, manager) 0.00.30 - better PS script for write user 0.00.31 - bug fixed, additional parameters to load from excel 0.00.32 - automatic replenishment of the table 0.00.33 - bugfix: copy to cell path only container names. delete name of profile. 0.00.34 - added right click menu for container move 0.00.35 - remove diacritic from username (in autocomplete), added split from full name to first and second cell. 0.00.36 - added icons 0.00.37 - project rename. "PowerShell2_CreateADuserFromExcel" -> "ADuser_creator" 0.00.38 - redesign 10% (form) 0.00.39 - redesign 80% (functions) add clear for column if user was not found 0.00.40 - redesign 100%(excel and ctrl+V) 0.00.41 - excel class 0.00.42 - group integration (ADuser [ADgroup], PS script [PS_GetUserGroups, PS_AddUserToGroups],table, + copy functions) 0.00.43 - excel class redesign, add automatic completion for department,description,title,manager,group (from office), added cloneToTable method 0.00.44 - BugHunt: (search group for non existional user) => crash. + add Automatic replenishment for Path. 0.00.45 - (removeStartEndSpaces) remove spaces when (ctrl+v) to table hapend 0.00.46 - BugHunt: ctrl+v (get number of row from datagridrow and insert to datatable1. Bad when sort happend) + completion(disabled when sort happend). 0.00.47 - added form for change path to excel. 0.00.48 - added FormMoveUser for better toring (container)paths, added versions.XML
